meanings.sent1: The small pebble on the path seemed noteless to most people.
meanings.sent2: The noteless scribbles on the paper were quickly forgotten.
meanings.sent3: The noteless ant struggled to carry the tiny crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her noteless existence felt like a shadow in the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The noteless whisper of the wind barely rustled the leaves.

meanings.definition: Not worthy of attention or notice
meanings.sent1: The noteless stain on the carpet went unnoticed for days.
meanings.sent2: His noteless remarks during the meeting were easily ignored.
meanings.sent3: The noteless fly buzzed around the room, bothering no one.
meanings.sent4: The noteless cloud drifted across the sky, unseen by all.
meanings.sent5: In the noteless corner of the garden, a single flower bloomed.
